name: 世阳教你学防灾
description:
Game introduction "Disaster prevention simulator" is a science simulation game, the players control the game characters to walk or do something,then they can learn some knowledge about meteorological disaster prevention , such as snowstorm, dust storms, floods and other common sense.
The game is constantly updated, the version has joined the voice ~ the story will continue to update ~Preface "Disaster prevention is a very important thing ~" Shi Yang said with a smile, "we learn together"Game features
    [Meteorological disaster prevention education content]
    [The game music is very special]
StaffPlanner：Shino Weibo：http://weibo.com/theloon
Programmer：defisym Weibo：http://weibo.com/defisym、WXW
Writer：Dustman
